product_name: Mario BadescuHydrating Glow Toner with Jojoba and PHA
summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Hydrating Glow Toner with Jojoba and PHA brightens and rejuvenates skin with its unique dual-action formula. It‚Äôs one-part toner and one-part serum formulated to enhance skin‚Äôs natural luminosity, giving it a radiant, youthful glow.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsJojoba Seed Oil: Similar in structure to the natural oils produced by the skin, it can help to regulate natural oil production. Rich in antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals, it soothes and nourishes skin.Sodium Hyaluronate: A form of hyaluronic acid that is well-known for its ability to deeply hydrate and plump the skin.Vitamin E: An antioxidant that can help to protect the skin from environmental damage.Item 2612401How To UseAfter cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton pad. Wipe gently in outward motions until the pad comes up clean. For external use only. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-10, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Gluconolactone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopherol, Polysorbate 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl Palmitate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Polysorbate 80, Sorbitan Stearate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Phospholipids, Xanthan Gum, Glucomannan, Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Sulfite, Sodium Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton pad. Wipe gently in outward motions until the pad comes up clean. For external use only. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Great toner!
reviews.comments: I love this toner! It doesnt have a smell, is gentle and effective. It really has cleared my pores. I was shocked at the amount of stuff still on my face after washing it thoroughly! This product gets my face clean, clean and doesnt overdry. It evens out my complexion as well. Inhave been using it for two weeks, and see a big difference.

reviews.headline: Great Toner!
reviews.comments: This toner was recommended by an Ulta worker and I have been thrilled with the results. I use it with the COSRX Snail Mucin line and a multitude of The Ordinary treatments for a personalized skin care regimen that has made my skin look and feel firmer, healthier, and younger. This is the first toner I have really liked other than the Arbonne RE9 toner which is very expensive and hard to find.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Love it, so nice and hydrating

reviews.headline: Best Toner
reviews.comments: Love this product ü•∞

reviews.headline: Perfect for me
reviews.comments: My skin is combination & senstive. This is mildly hydrating so it takes away the itchy dryness but doesnt feel heavy for someone like me with a sensory issue to moisturizers

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: I have rosacea this is great after oil cleansing and before moisturizer

reviews.headline: Had high hopes
reviews.comments: After reading the reviews, I was really excited to try this, but I probably wont purchase again, mostly because it felt tacky on my skin and I hate that feeling. I'm not feeling any hydration from it either. I'm just putting it directly on my skin with my hands after washing. I'll keep trying to work with it, but I don't think it's for me.

reviews.headline: Love this product!!!
reviews.comments: I have tried so many toners and they feel like they do nothing. Have no benefits. This toner i can actually tell works and helps. My face is smoother and skin tone and texture has evened out. This is a moisturizing toner and i just love it! I am 54 yrs old with dehydrated wrinkled and have some acne on cheeks. A definite must for mature skin and other skin types i would try it out too! Great value too!

reviews.headline: Feels Hydrating
reviews.comments: I just got this, but so far I feel it is hydrating to my dry skin. Feels nice putting it on. Very minimal smell.

reviews.headline: Glowy Beautiful and Moisturizing
reviews.comments: I NEVER leave product reviews, but this is so perfect! My skin was dull and dry and I added this into my skincare routine and im so glad I did. The jojoba is so moisturizing. The added glow is phenomenal. Best of their products!

reviews.headline: RUN
reviews.comments: Not many reviews are out because this is new. I decided to purchase anyway and I do not regret. Directions state to use a cotton swab for application. No need, would only waste product and just not necessary. Only put a dime worth size in your hands and gently rub into skin. A little goes a long way. This is not a typical toner. It is thicker than water, but far from a lotion. It literally melts right into your skin leaving the most glowy,  beautiful, natural skin. Dries like normal. No residue, so leaves room for a serum or moisturizer. I typically purchase based on reviews but ran with it because of price point. Lastly, this smells like absolute heaven in the mildest scent. Will last a long time.

reviews.headline: OMG, this is the one!
reviews.comments: Just buy it.  It's a combo toner/serum.  Wonderfully hydrating, my skin gobbled it up and soaked it in immediately.  My skin is so happy & glowing.  A beautiful, light fragrance.  Normally hate using toners, but this is THE ONE.  XO

reviews.headline: Great for daily use.
reviews.comments: I have been searching for a toner/essance that has exfoliating properties without irritating my senstive skin, finally found it. I love its gentle exfoliation while still being hydrating. Doesn't have much of a scent at all.

reviews.headline: Smells funny
reviews.comments: I love the ingredients, but I don't care for the smell

reviews.headline: Must have toner!
reviews.comments: Mario has some great products, especially in their newer editions to the brand. I really enjoyed this new product. My skin isnt irritated and its glowing! I would buy this, lip mask, and their sunscreen above any other!

reviews.headline: As advertised, I'm so happy!
reviews.comments: The texture of a K-beauty essence with a light lux scent. Fast absorbing and layerable. Gentle. Plays well with others. I'm in!

reviews.headline: 2 IN 1??? I'll take it!
reviews.comments: You guys‚Ä¶ stop it right now! They seriously nailed it with this toner! Its hydrating and exfoliating in one! You have the option to wipe down with a cotton pad and press the residual into skin like an essence. I'm here for it!

reviews.headline: Love this tonerü§ç
reviews.comments: I absolutely adore this product & so excited that I found it!

reviews.headline: LOVE!!! So Hydrating and cleans my skin so well.
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for the last month. It picks up excess makeup and it hydrates so nicely. This is absolutely my new favorite toner. Very lovely light scent and my skin is so radiant after I use it I don't even need makeup if I don't feel like it.

reviews.headline: I love the way this toner makes my skin feel
reviews.comments: I love this toner. It has changed my skincare routine for good. I love how this product is like a toner and serum in one and i can use it a second time if my skin is feeling dehydrated. I am already almost done with my first bottle!

faceoff_positive.comments: Not many reviews are out because this is new. I decided to purchase anyway and I do not regret. Directions state to use a cotton swab for application. No need, would only waste product and just not necessary. Only put a dime worth size in your hands and gently rub into skin. A little goes a long way. This is not a typical toner. It is thicker than water, but far from a lotion. It literally melts right into your skin leaving the most glowy,  beautiful, natural skin. Dries like normal. No residue, so leaves room for a serum or moisturizer. I typically purchase based on reviews but ran with it because of price point. Lastly, this smells like absolute heaven in the mildest scent. Will last a long time.

I'm not feeling any hydration from it either. I'm just putting it directly on my skin with my hands after washing. I'll keep trying to work with it, but I don't think it's for me.

rollup.name: Hydrating Glow Toner with Jojoba and PHA
